divs: sighting detailsmy son took some photos of the rainbow like rings around the sun, or "sundogs" with his cellphone camera, 4shots in a row. as the sun was too bright to look at directly he simply held the camera out of the truck window and clicked off 4 shots . when he looked at them later he could see the object, and that it moved significantly in respect to it's position adjacent to the sun. he has the photos on his phone, they clearly show something, possibly with a halo of it's own . the photos are not enhanced in any way and should be time\date stamped and location. i can e-mail them if need bei
Summary: only saw after viewing photos taken of "sundogs"
trends: There has been one other sighting in Nipawin
There were no other sightings in Nipawin on or around May 8th 2013
